title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Marriott’s Digital Transformation: Engineering the Future with Harness (DVT104)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 万豪数字化转型：与Harness共同构建未来工程 (DVT104)
abstract: Marriott International has reimagined what technology can do for hospitality—transforming its engineering, infrastructure, and culture to deliver innovation at global scale. In this session, Marriott leaders Adnan Haq (VP, DevSecOps & Infrastructure) and Sean Corkum (Senior Director, DevSecOps & Automation) join Harness CEO Jyoti Bansal to share how Marriott built a cloud-first, automation-driven foundation—replacing legacy systems, cutting environment setup time from months to minutes, and scaling secure, efficient operations across the enterprise. This presentation is brought to you by Harness, Inc, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 万豪国际重新定义了技术在酒店业中的作用——转变其工程、基础设施和文化，以在全球范围内提供创新。在本次会议中，万豪领导者Adnan Haq（DevSecOps与基础设施副总裁）和Sean Corkum（DevSecOps与自动化高级总监）与Harness首席执行官Jyoti Bansal一起分享万豪如何构建云优先、自动化驱动的基础——替换遗留系统，将环境设置时间从数月缩短至数分钟，并在整个企业范围内扩展安全、高效的运营。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Harness公司提供。
